title: Carmen Sandiego: To Steal or Not to Steal
director: Jos Humphrey, Kevin Dart, Kenny Park
writer: Duane Capizzi, May Chan, Greg Ernstrom
short_cast: Gina Rodriguez, Finn Wolfhard, Abby Trott, Michael Hawley, Liam O'Brien, Mary Elizabeth McGlynn, Toks Olagundoye, Sharon Muthu
cast: Gina Rodriguez, Finn Wolfhard, Abby Trott, Michael Hawley, Liam O'Brien, Mary Elizabeth McGlynn, Toks Olagundoye, Sharon Muthu

desc: You drive the action in this interactive adventure, helping Carmen save Ivy and Zack when V.I.L.E. captures them during a heist in Shanghai.
